org.opends.server.admin.std.server

Interface RC4PasswordStorageSchemeCfg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configuration, PasswordStorageSchemeCfg

    public interface RC4PasswordStorageSchemeCfg
extends PasswordStorageSchemeCfg
    A server-side interface for querying RC4 Password Storage Scheme settings.

    The RC4 Password Storage Scheme provides a mechanism for encoding user passwords using the RC4 reversible encryption mechanism.
